DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the performance of volume responsiveness in predicting the outcome of mechanical ventilation weaning in critically ill patients.
DOC.brief_title: Volume Responsiveness Before SBT Predicts the Outcome of Mechanical Ventilation Weaning in Critically Ill Patients
DOC.criteria: mechanical ventilation pregnancy or breastfeeding tracheostomy at baseline myasthenia gravis or acute polyradiculoneuropathy endstage chronic illness
